Bernie Sanders Paul Ryan( R., Wis.) will play a starring role: All eyes will be on Barack Obama this evening as he delivers his much-anticipated State of the Union address. But it's a momentous day for House Budget Committee chairman Paul Ryan( R., Wis.) as well.
